engagement_activity.question: Have you ever felt nervous or anxious about the Second Coming?

points.title: Accept the Gospel Through Covenants
points.question: How have covenants helped you feel closer to the Savior?

points.title: Seek the Holy Ghost
points.quote: Consistent, personal acts of devotion invite the Holy Ghost.
points.question: What daily habit invites the Holy Ghost into your life?

points.title: Avoid Deception
points.question: How does regular temple worship help you avoid deception?

points.title: Magnify Your God-Given Abilities
points.quote: Rely upon the Savior to magnify your abilities.
points.question: What talent has God given you to magnify?

points.title: Avoid Comparison and Trust the Savior
points.quote: Enter into the joy of thy lord.
points.question: How does the Savior’s grace help overcome inadequacy?

points.title: Serve Others as Serving the Savior
points.question: Can you share a time you served someone as if serving the Savior?

points.title: Use Your Gifts to Bless the Vulnerable
points.quote: Use your gifts to serve Heavenly Father’s children.
points.question: Who can you bless with your unique gifts?

sections.summary: Brief summary tying together themes of the lesson...
sections.final_question: What specific action will you take this week to prepare to meet the Savior?
sections.commitment_invitation: Invite participants to write down their action and share briefly.
